title: r/Relationships My GF Cheated On Me And Got Pregnant... Should I Stay With Her?
description: r/Relationships_Advice In today's episode, OP gets some truly awful news. He finds out that his girlfriend cheated on him with another man, and got pregnant from it! He wants out of the relationship, but he's surprised that all of his friends and even his family is pressuring him to stay with her. Even his own dad is fighting with him that he needs to support her. What should he do? Should he dump his cheating girlfriend, or stick with her? Let me know your thoughts down in the comments!
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
